title: Guardians of Technology looking for a coach
body:
Tho organisation Guardians of Technology (GOT) is searching for a League of Legends Coach for our Team.
We have an realy involved team that play in the elo form diamond 4 to diamond 2 at the moment (Solo Queue)
You should speak good english and you need very much theoretical knowledge about the meta and about gameplay.
If you are interested feel free to add me at league or answer at this post.
